quest.name: Salve Our Souls
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol is despairing at the workers' clumsiness.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid mineral oil in the K'mul AstropolisDeliver the splendid mineral oil to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid greenwattle in the K'mul AstropolisDeliver the splendid greenwattle to Qhoterl PasolGather a splendid pondfrond at the LozatlDeliver the splendid pondfrond to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Underground caverns can be frightfully dangerous, you know! The workers are constantly tripping over and grazing their snouts and whatnot.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Thankfully, the Viis were kind enough to share a recipe for a salve that works wonders for scrapes and cuts. If you're not terribly busy, I was wondering if you'd help gather some of the necessary ingredients?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: For now, I need some mineral oil, which you should be able to find near the K'mul Astropolis. There's no rush, but sooner is always infinitely preferable to later!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: For now, I need some greenwattle, which you should be able to find near the K'mul Astropolis. There's no rush, but sooner is always infinitely preferable to later!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: For now, I just need a piece of pondfrond, which grows in the Lozatl. It's rather difficult to find, but a fruit worm will lead you right to it. By all accounts, they're drawn to the smell!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: How are those ingredients coming along?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: How are those ingredients coming along?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I can tell by the spring in your step you've met with some success. Come along then, let's see what you've brought me!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Splendid! With this, I'll have a fresh batch of ointment ready in no time at all, though I cannot help but feel that, in this case, prevention would be better than cure.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Perhaps if the workers could refrain from injuring themselves at every given opportunity, there wouldn't be such high demand for the stuff. Until then, I may have need to call on your talents again!
